::Scyther::

Scyther sits back in his seat, closing his eyes and thinking over his 
plan one more time before taking the controls. He would arrive at 
Cybertron a little after Killfest and his group had been captured by 
the Maximals, and he would search for any escapers. Once he found two 
good ones, he'd bring them back. His disguise would help him, of 
course, but he had other useful skills.

"Allright, I'm otta here," he says over the comm, steering the 
shuttle upward toward space.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Chamaleon::
> 
> "3... 2.. 1... ZERO!!!!!" 
> 
> Chamaleon typed the commands and the shuttle moved towards the 
base's
